channel.title: Watership Aim on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Watership Aim on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: hohowhwhaahahahah
item.description: So today around 2:00 I talked to this dude from cnn about his site.. which I found posted to some random page.. and I was browsing through when I noticed some of the strangest stuff on there… so I immediately mirrored it.. ;) and now it is posted to drudgereport(screenshot) and smoking gun.. hehe.. poor guy..
